title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4020.4 - Calculation of time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4020.4 - Calculation of time

State Regulations
(a) When the last
day for doing anything under this Article falls on a Sunday, it may be done on
the following Monday, unless a race to which such act relates is appointed for
that day, in which case it must be done on the previous Saturday. (b) A month means a calendar month; a day
means 24 hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4020.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
